VEC.Q: How many ring layers are in this sunburst chart?
How many segments are in this sunburst chart?

SRP.Q: Is International Routes positioned outside, inside or on the same side as Passenger Flights?
SRP.A: International Routes is positioned {outside} Passenger Flights.

VPR.Q: Which top-level category has the highest proportion in this sunburst chart?
VPR.A: The top-level category with the highest proportion is {Freight and Logistics}.

NF.Q: Which categories in the segment Freight and Logistics exceed 100%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.
Which categories in the segment Freight and Logistics are below 100%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Freight and Logistics or Rail Freight?
NC.A: The value of {Freight and Logistics} is larger.

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Freight and Logistics, Rail Freight, Air Transport, or Commercial Airlines?
NC.A: The value of {Freight and Logistics} is the largest.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Freight and Logistics, Rail Freight, or Air Transport?
NC.A: The value of {Freight and Logistics} is larger.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Air Transport to Commercial Airlines to Passenger Flights to International Routes}.
